Wednus DKernel Documentation

Introduction

Wednus DKernel(DHTML Kernel) encapsulates the complexity of supporting various web browsers and establishes browser-neutral web application platform.
  • WML - Loads an arbitrary script file on the platform installation.
  • WED - Includes functions for debugging
  • WES - Add an event to the corresponding event library.
  • WRS - Load remote JS.

Architecture

Usage

 <head> .....
 <script src='<installation path>/wednus/wednus.js' type='text/javascript'></script>
 ..... </head>
